title: Slow Loading Times in Unified Folder
creator: acoombs46
content: I use the Unified Inbox feature and generally keep the Unread filter on unless I'm looking or searching for a specific message. Opening the app or reloading the Inbox takes up to 15-sec to go from a blank screen to showing the messages. I do have all the inboxes indexed on the device but the issue was observed with the standard 25 message limit as well. I have not had similar delays or have been met with a blank screen every time an email app is opened. Is there an ability to speed up the initial and subsequent loading times? It does hamper workflows and skews the perception of the app towards being inefficient or otherwise less than capable compared to similar apps.

title: Invalid correspondent name in "SENT" folder - Thunderbird installed on Android
creator: raymondrancourt
content:
I have been using Thunderbird as my mail service for many years, using it on the PC and my smartphone. Since several weeks ago, for an unknown reason, the "SENT" folder on the smartphone shows all the messages which were sent, but not with the correct name of the person/organization to who the email was sent. All my messages in the "SENT" folder are recorded as having been sent to "Lucie Payant" with a picture of her avatar, instead of showing the name of the real correspondent.

However, the "SENT" folder on my PC is fine and shows the correct correspondent to whom the email was sent to.

I verified all my settings, and, as far as I know, everything seems correct on my cell. This situation is very annoying and confusing.

Can you help me please. Raymond
